title: Vika CLI Configuration
description: Configuration file for vika-cli code generation tool

root_dir.description: Root directory for all generated files

schemas.description: Configuration for schema generation (TypeScript types and Zod schemas)

output.description: Output directory for TypeScript types and Zod schemas

naming.description: Naming convention for generated schema types

output.description: Output directory for API client functions

base_url.description: Base URL prefix for API endpoints. Supports environment variable substitution (e.g., ${API_BASE_URL}/v1)

modules.description: Configuration for module selection and filtering

ignore.description: List of OpenAPI tags/modules to exclude from generation

selected.description: List of OpenAPI tags/modules to include in generation (empty array means all modules)

spec_path.description: Path or URL to the OpenAPI/Swagger specification file
